text: Persian green is a cyanish green color. Persian green is a color used in pottery and Persian carpets in Iran. The color persian green is a medium dark shade of cyan. == Color codes == * The persian green's color code is #00a693 * Persian green is made of 0% red ,65,1% green and 57,65% blue * In HSV: (135Â°, 75%, 60%) == Related pages == * Persian blue * Blue * Cyan * Green
